Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bacitracin (natural AMPs, bacteria, prokaryotes, XXC, UCBB1a)

Literature.Author: Wei X, Hu Y, Sun C, Wu S. 2024
Literature.Reference: J Agric Food Chem. 2024 Mar 1. doi: 10.1021/acs.jafc.4c00573.PubMed
Literature.Title: Characterization of a Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Bacipeptin against Foodborne Pathogens.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (44.44%) toTemporin-1CEhN: 25%, I: 17%; warning: A = 2-Aminoisobutyric acid.Activity: active against S. aureus QD-2 or ATCC25923 MRSA (MIC 11.25-22.51 uM), B. cereus MCCC M25811 or 63301 (MIC 22.51-45.01 uM), E. faecalis CCARM 5172 (MIC 22.51 uM),  L. monocytogenes CGMCC 1.9136 (MIC 45.01 uM), not active against Gram- bacteria E.coli, S.choleraesuis CGMCC1.9136, and P.aeruginosa ATCC15692.Antivirulence:bacteria:  Antivirulence activity observed.THe APD thanks Shimei Wu for assistance with this entry. Est.3/2024
